TneTabControl Properties

Properties
 NameDescription
CloseAllOtherTabsLabel

The label for the "Close All Other Tabs" option in the popup menu.

CloseImageHover

Represents property CloseImageHover.

CloseImageNormal

The image for the close pic (normal state).

CloseImagePressed

Represents property CloseImagePressed.

CloseTabLabel

Defines the label for the Close menu in the popup menu.

DisablePopupMenu

Disables the popup menu when the user right-clicks on a tab.

HintStyle

If true shows the text of the tab as hint.

MaxTabWidth

Defines the maximum tab width.

MixTabWidth

Defines the minimum tab width.

PopupAfterDefault

This method is called after the construction of the default menu items. Use this method to add menu items at the end of the popup menu.

PopupBeforeDefault

This method is called before the construction of the default menu items. Use this method to add menu items in the beginning of the popup menu.

Version

Represents property Version.

Top
